trends: There have been no other sightings in Alanya
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring our holiday in Turkey last year (the 5th of august 2008 at 14:16 PM), at the end of a jeepsafari, we were riding up one of the hills surrounding Alanya in the south of Turkey. The driver stopped for a minute , almost halfway up the hill and I stood up in the jeep. I quickly took three pictures of the vieuw and we drove off. Only now, after a year, I was looking at the internet to some sites about UFO pictures and thought well, look in my personal files, maybe... And to my surprise there is one and maybe more ( the following two pics after this one also show a little strange white light in the sky at different hights) caught my attention. I really can't explain why I noticed it before!! Please take a look. It can be anything but I really can't explain what it is. Again, when I took the picture I didn't notice anything strange in the sky above Alanya that day. The weather was very good, no clouds, 35 degrees Celsius. Only now this evening ( 1st of September 2009) I looked at the pics and noticed. I am open for suggestions. Looking forward to your reaction.... With the kindest regards
Summary: Not noticed when taken the picture...
